content:
Yes, there are several great restaurants in the San Bernardino area for lunch. Here are a few recommendations:

1. Mitla Cafe - This restaurant has been serving up delicious Mexican food since 1937 and is located just a few blocks away from the original McDonald's.

2. The Mug - This casual spot offers sandwiches, salads, and burgers, as well as craft beers on tap.

3. Burgerim - If you're in the mood for burgers, this fast-casual spot offers customizable gourmet mini-burgers with a variety of toppings.

4. Tutti Mangia Italian Grill - If you're looking for something a bit more upscale, Tutti Mangia offers delicious Italian cuisine in an elegant setting.

5. The Mexico Cafe - This family-owned restaurant has been serving up authentic Mexican food since 1950 and is a popular spot for lunch and dinner.

I hope this helps! Enjoy your lunch!
